value.0: Greetings, <Master/Mistress>, might you be interested in my Animals?
Very Well. Would you like to Sell or Trade?
First I will give you <CUSTOM2040> gold coins for this one!
I can buy it back from you for <CUSTOM2040> gold coins!
How about you get off your horse then we can work a deal.
Very Well. Would you like to Sell or Trade?
First I will give you <CUSTOM2020> gold coins for this one!
I can buy it back from you for <CUSTOM2020> gold coins!
Which type of Animals are you interested in?
Sorry you have not enough experience to be purchasing a Horse or Pony yet.
Excellent! What can I help you with about Horses?
Sorry to hear that. I do hope you'll return soon.

Well I have various types of trained Horses for you to choose. There are Ponies for the smaller folk and Dwarven stock and large Horses for the everyone else. You may buy which ever you like but will only be able to ride the proper sized horse.

The selection is what you see behind me. Choose one.

NOTE: If thre are no Horses Available.....then you Do Not have not enough Gold.
Ohhh the Black Beauty! You can purchase it for just <CUSTOM2034> gold coins!
One of my favorite breeds! You can purchase it for just <CUSTOM2033> gold coins!
Excellent choice! You can purchase it for just <CUSTOM2032> gold coins!
A fine steed! You can purchase it for just <CUSTOM2031> gold coins!

Excellent! Here you go! Come back again! Please read your Horse Control for information on setting the Modes for your Horse!

I will purchase this Horse when you don't need it any longer. Just come back to me when you do. I only charge a 50% fee to buy the animal.
Excellent! Yes of course how foolish of me! What can I help you with about Pack Animals?
Sorry to hear that. I do hope you'll return soon.
Why, to carry your junk, err, I mean your precious items, of course.

All the animals come with a Pack Box you may load what you like in it. Each animal does have its own characteristics and can only carry what it can. They are all well trained though and will serve you faithfully. Would you like to look at what I have?
Well.....the Pack Box is dropped on the ground for you to access it. If you want you can purchase a new Pack Animal and reassign that Pack Box to the new animal too.
Well I have various types of trained beasts for you to choose. Depending on the loads you need them to help carry.

The selection is what you see behind me. Choose one.

NOTE: If thre are no Pack Animals Available.....then you Do Not have not enough Gold.
Yes <Sir/Madam> This Horse is only equaled by the bear in capacity. You can purchase it for just <CUSTOM2018> gold coins!
Yes <Sir/Madam> This Pony is small but can carry about as much as the Ox. You can purchase it for just <CUSTOM2017> gold coins!
Indeed <Sir/Madam>....This is the mightiest of all Pack Animals and large indeed. You can purchase it for just <CUSTOM2016> gold coins!
Yes <Sir/Madam> Pretty much standard fare through out the realms. This is second only to the Pack Bear in capacity. You can purchase it for just <CUSTOM2015> gold coins!
Strange that this creature even has enough sense to be trained but nonetheless has been and is a fine Pack Animal.....ere.....insect. You can purchase it for just <CUSTOM2014> gold coins!
Finicky but still reliable and smart. This animal can carry a moderate amount of weight. You can purchase it for just <CUSTOM2013> gold coins!
Yes Indeed! Not very strong but economical. You can purchase it for just <CUSTOM2012> gold coins!

Excellent! Here you go! Come back again!

I will purchase this Pack Animal when you don't need it any longer. Just come back to me when you do. I only charge a 10% fee to buy the animal.
Now this is a cute beast? Not very strong and thus can not carry much but how can you resist this charm? You can purchase it for just <CUSTOM2011> gold coins!
Nevermind.
I would like to trade my Horse.
Yes. I would like to trade this one in for a new one.
I changed my mind.
Done. Here you go. Was a good beast.
Yes. I would like to sell it back to you.
I changed my mind.
Done. Here you go. Was a good beast.
Sure. Give me a moment.
I would like to trade my Pack Animal.
Yes. I would like to trade this one in for a new one.
I changed my mind.
Done. Here you go. Was a good beast.
Yes. I would like to sell it back to you.
I changed my mind.
Done. Here you go. Was a good beast.
Yes I would.
Horses for Riding.
Ok. I'll be back.
Just looking. I will come back again someother time.
No, I don't think so today.
I think I could use a Horse. How much are they?
Well what do you have?
I will be back later.
I like the black horse.
I like the spotted horse.
I like the dapple horse.
I like the brown horse.
Sounds like a fine deal to me.
Thanks and I'll remember that.
Pack Animals of course.
Just looking. I will come back again someother time.
No, I don't think so today.
What exactly does one use a pack animal for?
What happens if the Animal dies?
Thanks for the info.
I think I could use a beast of burden. How much are they?
Well what do you have?
I will be back later.
A Pack Horse. A fine beast of burden indeed.
A Pack Pony. Small but nice.
A Pack Bear. Now this is a large and string beast!
A Pack Ox. Nice...pretty standard fare there.
A Pack Beetle. Strange Indeed.
A Pack Boar. Interesting.
A Pack Badger? You train all sorts don't you.
Sounds like a fine deal to me.
Thanks and I'll remember that.
A Pack Penguin? I don't want to know how......but how cute!
